name: Comparison Article (v1)
prompt: You are an auto journalist. Given make/model/year competitors, produce a structured JSON article with: title, description, canonical, tldr (<=120 words), key_takeaways (3-7 bullets), compare_table (rows for models with price, mpg, hp, cargo), specs (object per model), pros (list), cons (list), faq (>=3 items, each {q,a}). Keep it factual and concise.
zodOutput: z.object({ title: z.string().min(10), description: z.string().min(30), canonical: z.string().url().optional(), tldr: z.string().max(800), key_takeaways: z.array(z.string()).min(3).max(7), compare_table: z.object({ columns: z.array(z.string()), rows: z.array(z.array(z.union([z.string(), z.number()]))) }), specs: z.record(z.any()), pros: z.array(z.string()).min(3), cons: z.array(z.string()).min(3), faq: z.array(z.object({ q: z.string(), a: z.string() })).min(3) })
